task.title: Staging Docker image files on ZooKeeper ensemble nodes

taskbody.prereq: Before performing this procedure, verify that approximately 170MB of temporary space is available on the file system where /root is located.
taskbody.context: Use this procedure to add Docker image files to the delegate hosts that are ZooKeeper ensemble nodes. The files are used when the ZooKeeper ensemble is configured.

step.cmd: Log in to a delegate host .
Copy or move the install-zenoss-isvcs-zookeeper:vVersion.run file to /root.
Add execute permission to the file.
